Package lamont

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Item
    The Item Interface.
    MultimediaControl
    An interface method called MultimediaControl that defines several methods.
    ScreenSpec
    The ScreenSpec Interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AudioPlayer
    The AudioPlayer class is used by the GUI to create Audio Players extends Product implements MultimediaControl.
    AudioPlayerDriver
    The AudioPlayerDriver class was created simply to test the AudioPlayer class.
    Controller
    The Controller class where all of the code will be stored, carries out the functions of the GUI.
    DatabaseManager
    The DatabaseManager class the handles all of the database interactions.
    Employee
    The program is required to create an audit trail of the lamont.production line so that it records which employee recorded lamont.production.
    Main
    The Main Class that contains the Main method and initializes the stage.
    MoviePlayer
    The MoviePlayer class that creates screen object extending Product and implementing MultimediaControl.
    MoviePlayerDriver
    The MoviePlayerDriver class was created simply to test the MoviePlayer class.
    Product
    The Abstract Product class that establishes the basic functionality for all classes that implement it.
    ProductionRecord
    The Production Record class will align with items in the database.
    Screen
    The Screen class that creates screen object implementing ScreenSpec.
    ScreenDriver
    The ScreenDriver class was created simply to test the Screen class.
    TestProductionRecord
    Class designed to test the ProductionRecord class.
    Widget
    The Widget class was built as a test class for Product.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ItemType
    The ItemType enum.
    MonitorType
    The MonitorType enum.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllegalProductArgumentException
    The Exception that is thrown by all Product setters if a parameter is found to be invalid by the setter.
    IllegalProductionRecordArgumentException
    The Exception that is thrown by all Production Record setters if a parameter is found to be invalid by the setter.
